SEARCH
Package models

Class Membership

java.lang.Object
models.Membership
public class Membership extends Object
Membership class representing membership details in the system. Fields correspond to the Memberships table in the database. Fields: - membershipID: Unique identifier for the membership - membershipType: Type of the membership - membershipDescription: Description of the membership - membershipCost: Cost of the membership - memberID: Identifier for the member associated with the membership Author: Abiodun Magret Oyedele Date: 2025-12-06
